events.name: Business 365 Saturday | Singapore
events.description: October 24, 2015 This is the event to attend in 2015 for in-depth insights from world leading experts in the areas of SharePoint, Skype for Business, Office 365 and Office. Whether you are looking for technical knowledge, architectural approaches, or business strategy, this is where you will find your answers. We expect to have 15 topic sessions covering all aspects of SharePoint, Skype for Business, Office 365, and Office 2016. This Business 365 Saturday is a unique event because it is absolutely free, anyone can attend, it won't interfere with your work schedule, and it's planned with a community focus in mind. We bring the experts, consultants, and Microsoft MVPs from around the country to share their experiences, tips, and best practices. You won't get a day of sales pitches, instead you will receive training and the opportunity to network with other users. This is a great opportunity for you to meet other Microsoft professionals in the Singapore community, ask questions, network, and share your experiences. We expect a variety of educational sessions for: • End Users • Power Users • SharePoint, Skype for Business, Office 365 Administrators • Developers • Project Managers • Architects • IT Strategists & Executives For detail agenda please visit our website http://business365.azurewebsites.net
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989

events.name: Learn the basics of PHP-Laravel.
events.description: I'm in Singapore for a couple of weeks, and I was thinking of doing a basic laravel workshop this Saturday, 24th October. It will only be for 3 to 5 people, and it will be free. Location is at Block 71, Ayer Rajah Crescent. I'll cover setting up development and deployment environments. Using MVC in laravel and building your first app. Let me know if this interests you? Do register here: http://tribehired.com/splash/plusAnd I'll select participants from there. Topics: 1. Learn the basics of setting up PHP laravel. 2. Setting up a live environment and deploy using git. 3. Develop your first app. Registration: 1. To register go to http://tribehired.com/splash/plus, 2. I will select participants from there, and provide address and further info on the workshop.

events.name: Rails Girls Meetup (October)
events.description: Following up from our previous session in September, we have planned another fun-filled Ruby on Rails workshop for you all this month! As usual, we will have a structured workshop syllabus to facilitate learning for the beginners. For those who have been attending our meetups regularly and/or know the basics of Ruby on Rails, our flexibility will still be there. If you'd like to work on your project or run through concepts/material with guidance, our coaches are more than happy to help and answer your questions. We love the enthusiasts! Come and join us at the October Rails Girls meetup! Agenda: • 10:00 - 10:15 Registration • 10:15 - 10:20 Introduction • 10:20 - 10:30 Break into groups • 10:30 - 13:00 Start to code  ---------- FAQs ---------- I haven't attended any previous Rails Girls events. Can I still join in this one? Absolutely! We can help you start with the Rails Girls app if you did not attend the last workshop. What should I bring? A working laptop and power supply. Is this free? Yes! But we are not providing any food/coffee. Can I come if I'm not a woman? Rails Girls is designed for women and anyone who self-identifies as a woman. Men are most welcomed as a participant's +1 . Is there an age limit? Nope! Event is full! What should I do? Join the waitlist! We'll let you know when a new slot becomes available. Also, please update your RVSP if your plans have changed. Someone will really appreciate your slot. :) I'm a professional Rails Developer, can I be a coach? Yes, we are always looking for Ruby/Rails experts to help! Please contact Nathania (nathaniawong89@gmail.com) and DO NOT RSVP to this event. Confirmed coaches: - Sherwyn - Ted - Lachlan - Renato Can my company sponsor Rails Girls meetup? Thank you for helping us build an awesome community! If your company would like to sponsor this meetup, please get in touch with Winston (winston.yongwei@gmail.com).
events.location: SkyScanner Ltd, 39 Robinson Road #09-01 Robinson Point, Singapore

events.name: Web Development with Express - hackerschool
events.description:
Express is a small but powerful micro-framework for creating web applications in Node.js. In this workshop, we'll take a whirlwind tour of Express and, in the process, learn about the common MVC web application pattern. We'll also cover the basic ideas necessary for building web applications (whether in Express or otherwise).

Note:Familiarity with HTML/CSS and programming is expected. Knowledge of JavaScript is a plus, but is not required. Own laptop required.

http://school.nushackers.org/
events.location: SR3, Town Plaza, University Town, National University of Singapore
